Reviews.Title: great value for the money
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The viewsonic was simple to set up, picture quality was good, and the price was reasonable. Doesn't have all the bell's and whistle's associated with higher end t.v.'s but who cares. Don't have H/D so I can't comment on that aspect of the picture quality, but for a spare bedroom, which is where this is placed, it rocks!

Reviews.Author: Bob "bob3363"
Reviews.Content: Got it 2 days ago and love it .Picture quality is what we have been expected from 20" lcd tv and sound is a pretty loud.This is what we were looking for our bedroom.ProsHDTV readyNTSC/PAL supportbuilt in TV turner16 ms response time ( no such effect as ghosting )Consposition of component (YPbPr), S-video, FR (antenna/cable) connectorsno 16:9no DVI/VGA connectors (Having Samsung 730b, I'm not planning to use it as a monitor)no PIP ( not a problem for us, never use this function on our other TVs) I'd recommend this TV to anyone who are looking for basic LCD TV with good picture quality and  affordable price.Also,  REBATE form for this LCD TV ,purchased between Nov, 1 - Dec 31, is available on  [...].

Reviews.Title: Fabulous exept for the sound
Reviews.Author: tiffsterific "tiffsterific"
Reviews.Content: I picked it out of what I was offered and it is a fantastic HDTV.  I would not recommend it if you are just planning on watching regular cable and you have no HD box to let it live up to its full potential. The picture quality is better on a regular analog TV if you are hooking up to straight cable. I have had this TV for 2 months now and the only flaw that I can find is that the sound quality is not the best.  I hooked it up to my stereo and unfortunately the power of the TV is so weak that even turning it up all the way I wasn't able to get it to a listening level that was acceptable. That really bummed me out.  It actually sounds better when I just don't plug it into an exteranl source for sound. Other than that it is very light, you can hang it on the wall and its actually a great size for a bedroom tv.  I have it out in my living room now and its too hard to see if you are too far away from it. You are suppose to be able to hook it up to a computer as a monitor but I have not tried it yet.  According to reviews I read before buying, it wasn't a good monitor.  I bought it as a TV and it makes a great TV, its very stylish to boot. As long as you don't expect more than a fabulous picture you will be pleased with this product for the price.

Reviews.Title: simple
Reviews.Author: Liliane Leiser
Reviews.Content: Love this product. Channels switch instantly. Picture quality beyond great. Remote is very simple and basic. All I want.

Reviews.Title: Screen is dead after 18 months
Reviews.Author: Bradley D. Westcott "Hammer1965"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Viewsonic N2010 for the bedroom 18 months ago. Typically watch it 2-3 hours per night. A few nights ago the screen went black. I called tech. support and they said it is dead and out of warranty so I just threw it away. This is what happens when you try to take the cheap way out- you get burned. I will be sticking with the " known brands" for now on.Poor product, poor service and poor me.BW

Reviews.Title: Mines is broken
Reviews.Author: P. Mann "Dr. X"
Reviews.Content: I just got the TV and I'll be shipping it back tomorrow morning. The TV looks great and the picture is good too. Except for the fact that mines is defective it's otherwise perfect. I think the problem is with the black light. Sometimes when I turn on the TV, the picture turns off a second later and only the sound remains. I have to play turning in on and off for the picture to remain. I don't know if I'll have it replaced by another Viewsonic because I need something dependable
